title: Karvy ex-CEO Amitabh Chaturvedi’s firm acquires listed Canopy Finance - Moneycontrol
content: Karvy ex-CEO Amitabh Chaturvedi’s firm acquires listed Canopy Finance  Moneycontrol
description: Purple Finance, led by Chaturvedi, will be offering secured business loans ranging from Rs 4 lakh to Rs 10 lakh in the outskirts and tier-II cities of Maharashtra, Gujarat and Odisha.
